nodes.text: Quadrillium was a mineral found in abundance in asteroids, particularly within the Tava Yagen asteroid field. During the Galactic Civil War, it was valued at approximately 50-75 Credits per kilogram.
Quadrillium was mined on the planet Essowyn.
Quadrillium is misspelled as "quadrillum" in a table of metals and minerals appearing on page 37 of Pirates & Privateers. It is spelled correctly in other instances throughout.
